title: aLLi aLLi nalla
sahitya:
aLLi aLLi nalla varangaLai aLikkum aSTa lakSmi Om


anupallavi

  Adi lakSmi jyOti lakSmi Ananda lakSmi Om shuddhAnanda lakSmi Om


caraNam 1    tuLLum vIra vijayalakSmi shuddha sutantara samarasa lakSmi 
tunbam pOkki inbam pozhiyum sundara mangaLa suguNa lakSmi
    caraNam 2    dhana dhAnya saubhAgyalakSmi sAmrAjya svarAjya lakSmi
manai vaLarum santAna lakSmi mahAlakSmi un malaraDi paNindOm
    caraNam 3    tajjham takajham taLAngu tarikiTa dhimikiTa tOm ena tANDavam ADi 
ijjaga vAzhvinil ucchamAna jayam Indemai Adari shAnta mahAlakSmi
